theme.title: Notes tied to a triplet
theme.para: In this lesson a new rhythmic pattern is introduced, by tying a note to a triplet:

score.music: (Metrica 2 4 NoVisible)(n * n l)(n * c g+ t3)(n * c)(n * c g- t-)) (c (n * c g+)(n * c l g-)(n * c g+ t3)(n * c)(n * c g- t-)(Barra Final))

part.title: Lesson and note the differences
part.para: Note the difference between the first and the second measure, and between the third and the fourth. Note how they are formed when tying the note to the triplet:

score.music: (Metrica 2 4)(n * n)(n * c g+ t3)(n * c)(n * c g- t-)) (c (n * n l)(n * c g+ t3)(n * c)(n * c g- t-)) (c (n * c g+)(n * c g-)(n * c g+ t3)(n * c)(n * c g- t-)) (c (n * c g+)(n * c l g-)(n * c g+ t3)(n * c)(n * c g- t-)(Barra Final))

part.title: Exercises
part.para: Exercise 1 - Train your ear and practise the introduced rhythmic patterns.
Exercise 2 - Read scores containing the rhythms studied in this lesson.
